name: short-unique-id
description: Generate random or sequential UUID of any length

scripts.lib:build: yarn gen:version && rm ./lib/* && sucrase ./short_uuid -d ./lib -t typescript,imports && mv ./lib/mod.js ./lib/short-unique-id.js && rm ./lib/mod* ./lib/test* ; cp short_uuid/version.json ./lib && echo 'module.exports = ShortUniqueId;' >> ./lib/short-unique-id.js
scripts.dist:build: rm ./dist/* ; echo 'var __suid_module = ' > ./dist/short-unique-id.js && browserify ./lib/short-unique-id.js >> ./dist/short-unique-id.js && echo 'var ShortUUID = __suid_module(1);' >> ./dist/short-unique-id.js && minify ./dist/short-unique-id.js > ./dist/short-unique-id.min.js
scripts.test: yarn gen:version && cd short_uuid && deno test && cd .. && yarn link && yarn link short-unique-id && node ./runkit.js
